In Song of Solomon, for example, Morrison tells the story of an African American man and his search for identity in his culture.
A search for African American values.

other.text: They construct their colonies on precious farmland, invading crops while searching for insects underground.
Since that time humans have been going up and down the earth, digging, climbing, and exploring—searching for something already within themselves.
The rise of oil prices made scientists search for new energy resources to ______ oil.
The police searched the house of the suspect _____.

definition.zh_def: 尋找或查詢某物或某信息的行為。
definition.en_def: The act of looking for or inquiring about something or information.
definition.example: I need to search for my lost keys.
